00026 CharacterController::CharacterController(Agent* agent) : 
00027                                                                    m_pAgent(agent),
00028                                                                            m_spAgentInfo(NiNew AgentInfo),

00056 void CharacterController::Update(const NxVec3& target)
00057 {
00058         Sense(target);
00059         UpdateForces();
00060         UpdatePhysX();
00061 }
00062 //------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00068 void CharacterController::Sense(const NxVec3& target)
00069 {
00070         m_spAgentInfo->m_vTarget      = target;
00071         m_spAgentInfo->m_vPos         = m_pAgent->GetActor()->getGlobalPosition();
00072         m_spAgentInfo->m_vVelocity    = m_pAgent->GetActor()->getLinearVelocity();
00073         m_spAgentInfo->m_vOrientation = m_spAgentInfo->m_vVelocity;
00074         m_spAgentInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00075 
00076         m_spBehavior->Execute(m_spAgentInfo);
00077         
00078 }
00079 //------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00084 void CharacterController::UpdateForces()
00085 {
00086         // generate force
00087         m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce = - (-m_fcKv0 * (m_spAgentInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity - m_spAgentInfo->m_vVelocity)
00088                                                              + m_fcDamp *  m_spAgentInfo->m_vVelocity);
00089         // constrain force
00090         NxVec3 heading = m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce;
00091         heading.normalize();
00092         if (m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce.magnitude() > m_spAgentInfo->m_fcMaxForce)
00093         {
00094                 m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce = heading * m_spAgentInfo->m_fcMaxForce;
00095         }
00096         else if (m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce.magnitude() < -m_spAgentInfo->m_fcMaxForce)
00097         {
00098                 m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce = heading * -m_spAgentInfo->m_fcMaxForce;
00099         }       
00100 }
00101 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 void CharacterController::UpdatePhysX()
00107 {
00108         
00109         if (!m_bTurnSpringsOff)
00110         {       
00111                 m_pAgent->GetActor()->addForce(m_spAgentInfo->m_vForce, NX_FORCE);
00112         }
00113         
00114         
00115 }
